data.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the references describing the data.

date.description: The time at which the network was sampled

description.description: A short description of the network

environment.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of environmental measurements associated to the network.

interactions.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the interactions in the network.

owner.description: A single related resource. Can be either a URI or set of nested resource data.

papers.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the references to the papers associated with the dataset.

public.description: Whether the network can be viewed by all users
